item.title: Cara deploy flask dengan gunicorn dan systemd
item.description: Spesifikasi Software Saya : Ubuntu 18.04 gunicorn==19.9.0 Flask==1.0.2 Python 3.6.8 Sublime Text (dengan shortcut subl di terminal) Informasi tentang tech stack Gunicorn adalah ? The Gunicorn “Green Unicorn” is a Python Web Server Gateway Interface HTTP server. It is a pre-fork worker model, ported from Ruby’s Unicorn project. The Gunicorn server is broadly compatible with a number of web frameworks, simply implemented, light on server resources and fairly fast.
